content.question:
The plot has 6 data points.

The data points are in the pattern of a curve that trends up first gradually and then sharply from left to right.

The data points have the following approximate coordinates:

(1 comma 6)

(2 comma 9)

(3 comma 30)

(4 comma 260)

(5 comma 3,100)

(6 comma 46,600)

The plot has 6 data points.

The data points are in the pattern of a curve that trends up first sharply and then gradually from left to right.

The data points have the following approximate coordinates:

(1 comma 6)

(5 comma 30)

(25 comma 630)

(50 comma 2,500)

(100 comma 10,000)

The plot has 12 data points.

The data points are in a symmetrical pattern:

The data points are first in a linear pattern trending down from left to right.

The data points are then in a linear pattern trending up from left to right.

The data points have the following approximate coordinates:

(negative 100 comma 290 million)

(negative 50 comma 31,850)

(negative 25 comma 334)

(negative 10 comma 22)

(negative 5 comma 9)

(negative 1 comma 4)

(1 comma 4)

(5 comma 9)

(25 comma 334)

The plot has 6 data points.

The data points are in a linear pattern trending up from left to right.

The data have the following approximate coordinates:

(1 comma 4)

(5 comma 9)

(10 comma 22)

(25 comma 334)

(50 comma 31,850)

(100 comma 290 million)

A data set is modeled by an exponential function of the form <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals a b to the power of x"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, where <math alttext="a greater than 0"><mi>a</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="b greater than 1"><mi>b</mi><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></math>. A semi-log plot of the data set is constructed. If <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is an appropriate model, which of the following could be a semi-log plot of the data?

choices.label: A plot. The horizontal axis ranges from 0 to 7. The vertical axis ranges from 1 to 100,000. Its values are 1, 10, 100, 1,000, 10,000, and 100,000. Refer to long description.
A plot. The horizontal axis ranges from 0 to 120. The vertical axis ranges from 1 to 100,000. Its values are 1, 10, 100, 1,000, 10,000, and 100,000. Refer to long description.

A plot. The horizontal axis ranges from negative 100 to 100. The vertical axis ranges from 1 to 1 billion. Its values are 1, 10, 100, 1,000, 10,000, 100,000, 1 million, 10 million, 100 million, and 1 billion. Refer to long description.

A plot. The horizontal axis ranges from 0 to 120. The vertical axis ranges from 1 to 1 billion. Its values are 1, 10, 100, 1,000, 10,000, 100,000, 1 million, 10 million, 100 million, and 1 billion. Refer to long description.

content.answer: A plot. The horizontal axis ranges from 0 to 120. The vertical axis ranges from 1 to 1 billion. Its values are 1, 10, 100, 1,000, 10,000, 100,000, 1 million, 10 million, 100 million, and 1 billion. Refer to long description.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
